attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Having been through the pain of divorce, it was with horror I discovered the one sided law and views of the judges in this matter. Why are women allowed to use this system for there own gain even when they are to blame, the law should be 50/50 fairs fair so many farther are are penalised in not having access to thee children, are reduced to live like a pauper while the wife lives like a king, why is this ????
